topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## Pomodoro

A visual Pomodoro timer with configurable durations and long break cycles. Tracks completed sessions and adapts to your preferred workflow.

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Visual Timer** — A circular progress ring shows remaining time at a glance, colored red during work and green during breaks.

**Configurable Durations** — Customize work, short break, and long break lengths from the settings panel.

**Long Break Cycle** — After a configurable number of work sessions (default 4), the timer suggests a longer break.

**Session Tracking** — Completed work sessions are shown as tomato dots below the timer and tracked for the last 30 days.

**Persistent State** — Timer state is saved so it resumes correctly if the app is restarted mid-session.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Start Pomodoro** | Starts a work timer |
| **Stop Pomodoro** | Stops the current timer |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log timer events for debugging |
| **storage** | Persist timer state and session history |
| **notifications** | Alert when work/break intervals end |
| **commands** | Register Start and Stop commands |
| **widgets** | Display the timer countdown in the status bar |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
